text: The Miss Nicaragua 2010 pageant, was held on February 27, 2010 in Managua, after weeks of events. At the conclusion of the final night of competition, Scharllette Allen Moses became the first Miss Nicaragua titleholder from the Caribbean Coast of Nicaragua. She represented Nicaragua at Miss Universe 2010 held later that year in Las Vegas, USA. The rest of the finalists would enter different pageants. ==Placements== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font- size: 95%;" |- ! Final results ! title: Miss Nicaragua 2010
